      Constructor parameters in org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core with type arguments of type Edge 
      Constructor and Description
      Path(java.util.List<Edge> edges)
      Construct an object representing a path, the constructor will check if the passed list of edges is such that for every consecutive edges the head node of the first edge coincide with the tail node of the subsequent in order for connectivity to be there.
